thread.title: Sandwich thief gets called out by co-worker, post-it war ensues : theCHIVE
thread.title_full: Sandwich thief gets called out by co-worker, post-it war ensues : theCHIVE

title: Sandwich thief gets called out by co-worker, post-it war ensues : theCHIVE
text:
source 
When you’re working in an office- or anywhere else for that matter, sometimes all you have to really look forward to, other than going home, is whatever you brought for lunch. Sadly, one poor person couldn’t even have that, for several days straight. Someone kept stealing the sandwich of this unfortunate employee, and it meant war. Sort of. 2 
When you don’t feel like making your way around the office to individually interrogate everyone in the building, leaving a little note on the fridge is the next best option. 3 
The sandwich thief responds. He or she is demanding money, and that’s just messed up. 4 
Those look like man hands, so, we can narrow it down to either a dude, or a woman who has the hands of Andre the Giant. 5 
Oh so now TINA is stepping in eh? Advertisement
